channel.title: [PI] Lunar spellbook
channel.description:
Ok guys I'm currently working on a PI base but my problem is that it doesn't have a lunar spellbook added to it... Can someone help me with it? How do I get/make it in my server
thanks

item.title: [PI] Lunar spellbook

Add my msn "rsps_coder@hotmail.com" ill fix it for you through teamviwer or something.

item.title: [PI] Lunar spellbook
item.dc:creator: @Coolrick Coolrick
item.description:
@Coolrick wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Lunar is already added in the client, though it hasn’t been configured for the server yet.

Though; there is one server out with the interface, (that I know of.)


Click the image to visit the source download page.[/quote] Thanks for that but my server is already coded except the lunar spellbook…
So if you know how to fix it please help me man
I can’t change bases now anymore

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Lunar spellbook
item.dc:creator: @Coolrick Coolrick
item.description:
@Coolrick wrote:

[quote=“Ground zero 317, post:2, topic:356817”]so far there isnt no lunar for pi you if you want lunar you will have to make the interface. Besides that add veng to ancient or regular. BTW: This is client sided if you need more help post topic in client.[/quote]Is it hard to make?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Lunar spellbook

so far there isnt no lunar for pi you if you want lunar you will have to make the interface. Besides that add veng to ancient or regular. BTW: This is client sided if you need more help post topic in client.
